headline: Why Income Investors Shouldn’t Overlook A. O. Smith Corporation (AOS) When Searching for Cheap Dividend Stocks
summary: A. O. Smith Corporation (NYSE:AOS) is included among the 13 Incredibly Cheap Dividend Stocks to Invest in. A. O. Smith Corporation (NYSE:AOS) ranks among the biggest producers of residential and commercial water heaters, boilers, and water treatment systems in North America.
